sources.title: 365 Nights In Hollywood (1934) DVD MKV
sources.description: DVD remux of the 1934 Fox film "365 Nights in Hollywood." IMDb TMDB Wikipedia 365 Nights in Hollywood is a 1934 American Pre-Code musical comedy film directed by George Marshall and starring Alice Faye, James Dunn and Frank Mitchell. It was based on a collection of short stories of the same title by columnist Jimmy Starr, published in 1926. It was produced and distributed by Fox Film.

metadata.Plot: Down-on-his-luck film director Jimmie Dale takes a job at a fly-by-night acting school. He is drawn into the plans of the school's owner to bilk a wealthy young man out of the funds he has supplied to shoot a movie starring pretty student Alice Perkins. But Jimmie hopes to bilk the bilkers by actually completing the movie as ostensibly planned.
metadata.Writer: William M. Conselman, Henry Johnson, Jimmy Starr
metadata.Actors: James Dunn, Alice Faye, Frank Mitchell
